about_the_game:
On a daring search and recover mission, fate catapults you through a mysterious wormhole, leaving you marooned in an uncharted sector of space. Prepare for the journey of a lifetime as you overcome the relentless pursuit of a rogue imperial legion, explore fantastical alien worlds, and put your resourcefulness to the test in search of a way back home.




Venture into the far reaches of the universe and discover lush forests teeming with alien life, mystical frozen mountains, and scorching crystalline lava fields. Each environment harbors unique creatures, resources, and hidden anomalies that push the boundaries of your imagination.




With deep character customization, forge a space explorer that suits your unique playstyle. As you progress, unlock powerful perks, enhance your attributes, and delve into groundbreaking research to access new technologies. Gain mastery over various disciplines to refine your skills and become an unstoppable force in the vast expanse of space.




Become a masterful engineer as you engage with intricate crafting systems. Scour the cosmos for an array of valuable resources, each holding a unique potential for enhancing your spaceship, weaponry, and equipment. Create remarkable items, discover innovative uses for crafting components, and improve resource refinement efficiency in a gratifying progression of skill and mastery.




Discover a world teeming with hidden treasures and powerful artifacts. Plunder and craft an extensive arsenal of unique weapons and equipment, each with distinct abilities, providing you with a strategic advantage in challenging battles against android armies and enigmatic creatures. With millions of items and hundreds of unique models, you can customize your appearance and gear to complete your ultimate build.




Prepare for an enthralling journey where you'll encounter puzzles to solve, treacherous cave systems to explore, and engaging conversations with your AI companion. Flee from hordes of relentless alien frogs, demolish structures with C4 explosives, wield your ship's mighty cannons, concoct mysterious potions, close interdimensional rifts, and intercept valuable supply drops. The realm of possibilities is vast, and the fate of the cosmos is in your hands!


Far Horizon is a passion project brought to life by two brothers with a shared dream. We've poured our hearts and souls into every pixel and line of code, crafting an immersive experience that we hope you'll love as much as we do. Reach out to us on Discord with your opinions, ideas, and criticisms - we want to hear your feedback!

name: Far Horizon

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-8100 | AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 670 | AMD Radeon HD 7850
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9600K | AMD Ryzen 5 3600X
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080 | AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: Far Horizon is an action-adventure RPG set in the far reaches of space where floating islands, beautiful vistas, and alien creatures await. Embark on an epic adventure of exploration, ingenuity, and survival as you loot, shoot, and craft to forge your destiny among the stars.
